job_title: Agile Scrum Project Manager with MDM
jd: From: Anudeep, Fluxtek Solution Inc anudeep@fluxteksol.com Reply to: anudeep@fluxteksol.com Title : Agile Scrum Project Manager with MDMLocation: Plano, Texas – OnsiteDuration: ContractJD:-Primary Skill Project Manager Agile Scrum MasterExperience Technical Project management Scrum Master experience in DATA related domains Data warehousing Cloud data migration etcMust be well versed with Agile project delivery and be able to drive Scrum ceremonies independentlyA proven track record of successful project implementation in a software or technology environmentExperience in a scrum master roleFamiliarity with software developmentExcellent knowledge of Scrum techniques and artifacts such as definition of done user stories automated testing backlog refinementTeam management experience comfortable matrix managing project teams of up to 20 people
